description.value: Your elemental lineage manifests as magma and molten rock, and you can focus the magma into your hand to attack your foes. You gain a magma spike unarmed attack, which requires a free hand to use. This is an agile, finesse, unarmed attack in the brawling weapon group that deals [[/r 1d4[piercing]]] damage, as well as [[/r 1[fire]]] damage. Instead of the normal critical specialization effect, the target takes [[/r {1d6}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Fire Damage}; you gain a bonus on this persistent damage equal to your item bonus to attack rolls on unarmed attacks.
